titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Richard Long, Judgment
CWG8702

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons, Remissions, and Respites, 1862-1863

body.p:
Bourbon Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Ky Plff
agt on Indt Betting an Election
Richard Long Deft
1862 April Judgment for $100.00

Att:
James Paton C B C C

Bourbon circuit court
The Commonwealth of Ky Plff
agt on Indt Betting an Election
Henry Vankirk Deft

1862 April Judgment for $100.00
Att James Paton C B C C
Richd Long & Henry Vankirk to be filed with pettn to remit fine

Bourbon Cir Ct
Jesse Talbot see Downey
Upon statement of facts in this case by W. S Downey Comths Atty the fines in this case remitted

$100 each } Betting
Issd Feby 16. 1863.
Send remissin to Jesse Talbott Paris
